short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Сreate an affiliate link on the cpa.kit.global platform on the page of the advertiser’s website where the user is located

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can create an affiliate link on the cpa.kit.global platform on the page of the advertiser’s website where the user is located. Simply install the extension, go to the site and follow the instructions to copy a deeplink on the website's page.
